RIVAL_CANDIDATE_NAME: Name of the Contending Candidate in Bengali Script

POLITICAL_PARTY_NAME.CITY_CORPORATION_ELECTION: Political Party Name / Independent (Applicable only for Mayor's position)
POLITICAL_PARTY_NAME.MUNICIPALITY_ELECTION: Political Party Name / Independent (Applicable only for Mayor's position)

CONTESTING_CANDIDATES_PRESENT_ADDRESS: Present Address of the Contending Candidate
CONTESTING_CANDIDATES_PERMANENT_ADDRESS: Permanent Address of the Contending Candidate
